title: Zac
body:
"We like Zac's E, but once he uses it to get into a team fight, he doesn't have anything else cool to do! With improving his cool-ness in team fights in mind, let's make some changes!

Instead of a boring, lame, super disruptive, reliable, 4 bounce ult, we're giving him a neato, cool, slow, unreliable 1 bounce ult that lets you grab the enemy team and dump them right onto your carries!

Instead of a boring, aoe slow for a Q (who wants that in a teamfight? YAWN!), we'll make his Q into a low range, complex, unreliable ability that works best in 1v1 or 2v2 skirmishes.

Oh yea, and we're nerfing the coooooooool E we liked so much to begin with."

PS. Completely forgot about the idiotic voice change too. Why....

replies.body:
"don't worry guys were keeping his E the same because its a fan favorite ability that really defines the character!"

*nerfs the shit outta E*

Oh gee, thanks, I mean its totally the same and not at all a terrible shell of the ability it used to be. Great.
Don't forget the ultimate lost about 60% of its damage (more if you account for the loss of blobs that would let you spam your W) for the gimmick of scooping up someone, maybe.

I know... He had plenty of an identity, I have no idea why they did this... The damage nerf to his E on top of losing all the R damage too is just sad. It's like the reverse of buffing Amumu's passive and W at the same time last patch..

Q- hey lets make it useless in jungle. Aoe is op.

W- lets consider nerfing

E- Moar nerfs. The circle indicator aint enough

R- lets destroy zac. 

Riot: you destroyed Zac, revert him and accept you were dumb

I will be honest with you here.

Zac's Q is a better ability. It offers more depth and strong cc, at the cost of being less reliable and straigth forward. I'm fine with it. (Also, slamming enemies into each other is fun).

On his ultimate, though, i am triggered. Zac's previous ultimate was funnier, stronger, more reliable, more thematically fitting. **It was not an unealthy ability in any way.** Why the hell would you replace it, Riot? New one its situational, conditional, unreliable... That's not what Zac needs.

Concerning the general damage reduction, that was kind of the point of the whole update, and i'm the 1st to admit that Zac's damage was a bit overbearing.

I think the biggest issue is that Zac was kind of like Mundo, in the sense of him bringing not-as-much CC as other engage tanks, but he made up for it with raw damage.

Now they took away his damage... and **literally** took away more CC than they added.
(R lost 0.5 second cc, Q knocking into each other barely makes up for the lost E CC, losing the Q aoe slow int he process, and his new ult < old ult in terms of CC that means anything.)

So what they wound up dong is taking away CC, damage, tank, and giving him 'nothing'.

The worst part is that I don't think I'd even enjoy him anymore if his numbers somehow got buffed to viability. I liked Zac for being a meaty brawler, not a gimmick ult that does 0 damage.

You're very right to define current Zac's ultimate as a gimmick. It has immense potential, but in the average use it is situational and unreliable. I don't like the change one bit.

However, in my opinion you're understimating the cc his new q brings. It's a pretty hefty displacement for a standard ability.

On the damage side, he may be overnerfed now, but I still think that his combo was excessive for a tank.


On a side note, Mundo is a Juggernaut ;)
